//Print 1 to 10 odd no by using For loop
public class Q9_Java_Ass {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("odd number ");
		for(int i = 0; i<= 10 ;i++)
		{
			if(i % 2 == 1)
			{
				System.out.println(i);
			}
		}
	}

}

Output:-
Odd number
1
3
5
7
9
